#cusId#
0
) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS ELECTIVE FROM COU_COURSE_TBL WHERE COU_COURSE_TBL.STATUS = 0
COU_COURSE_TBL.TITLE like CONCAT('%',#courseName#,'%')
COU_COURSE_TBL.SORT_ID=#sortId#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM COU_COURSE_TBL WHERE COU_COURSE_TBL.STATUS = 0
COU_COURSE_TBL.TITLE like CONCAT('%',#courseName#,'%')

SELECT DISTINCT CUS.CUS_ID, CUS.CUS_NAME, CUS.CUS_PWD, CUS.EMAIL, CUS.MOBILE, CUS.REAL_NAME, CUS.SEX, CUS.ID_NUM, CUS.QQ, CUS.PHOTO, CUS.LASTLOGIN_IP, CUS.LASTLOGIN_TIME, CUS.REG_TIME, CUS.BIRTHDAY, CUS.LOGIN_TIMES, CUS.IS_COMPLETE, CUS.COMPLETE_TIME
FROM CUS_CUSTOMER_TBL CUS INNER JOIN CUS_CUS_COU_KPOINT_TBL CCK ON CUS.CUS_ID = CCK.CUS_ID INNER JOIN COU_COURSE_TBL COU ON CCK.COURSE_ID = COU.COURSE_ID INNER JOIN SYS_SUBJECT_TBL SUB ON SUB.SUBJECT_ID = COU.SUBJECT_ID INNER JOIN SYS_USER_GRADE_SUBJECT_ROLE_TBL UGSR ON UGSR.SUBJECT_ID = SUB.SUBJECT_ID AND UGSR.SUBJECT_ID = COU.SUBJECT_ID AND UGSR.GRADE_ID = COU.GRADE_ID INNER JOIN SYS_USER_TBL USERS ON UGSR.USER_ID = USERS.USER_ID
WHERE USERS.USER_ID = #userId#
UGSR.GRADE_ID = #gradeId#
UGSR.SUBJECT_ID = #subjectId#

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(CUS.CUS_ID))
FROM CUS_CUSTOMER_TBL CUS INNER JOIN CUS_CUS_COU_KPOINT_TBL CCK ON CUS.CUS_ID = CCK.CUS_ID INNER JOIN COU_COURSE_TBL COU ON CCK.COURSE_ID = COU.COURSE_ID INNER JOIN SYS_SUBJECT_TBL SUB ON SUB.SUBJECT_ID = COU.SUBJECT_ID INNER JOIN SYS_USER_GRADE_SUBJECT_ROLE_TBL UGSR ON UGSR.SUBJECT_ID = SUB.SUBJECT_ID AND UGSR.SUBJECT_ID = COU.SUBJECT_ID AND UGSR.GRADE_ID = COU.GRADE_ID INNER JOIN SYS_USER_TBL USERS ON UGSR.USER_ID = USERS.USER_ID
WHERE USERS.USER_ID = #userId#
UGSR.GRADE_ID = #gradeId#
UGSR.SUBJECT_ID = #subjectId#
